mapper.select: select t_request.rid, t_request.uid, t_request.name, t_request.cover, t_request.quality, t_request.price, t_request.description, t_request.launched, t_request.time, t_request.view_count, t_request.completed, A.tid `type_id`, CONCAT_WS('/', C.type_name, B.type_name, A.type_name) `type_name`, B.tid tid_middle, C.tid tid_root, t_user.uid uuid, t_user.username, t_user.nickname, t_user.avatar, t_user.introduction, t_user.baned_time, count(t_order_rating.level = 2 and t_order_rating.seller = 1 or null) good_rating_count_seller, count(t_order_rating.seller = 1 or null) rating_count_seller, count(t_order_rating.level = 2 and t_order_rating.seller = 0 or null) good_rating_count_buyer, count(t_order_rating.seller = 0 or null) rating_count_buyer, count(t_user_favorites_request.fid) favorite from db_happy_trade.t_request left join db_happy_trade.t_user_favorites_request on t_request.uid = t_user_favorites_request.uid, db_happy_trade.t_user left join db_happy_trade.t_order_rating on t_order_rating.target = t_user.uid, db_happy_trade.t_commodity_type A LEFT JOIN db_happy_trade.t_commodity_type B ON A.p_tid = B.tid LEFT JOIN db_happy_trade.t_commodity_type C ON B.p_tid = C.tid where t_request.type_id = A.tid and t_request.uid = t_user.uid and t_request.launched = 1 and t_request.rid = #{id}

SELECT t_request.rid, t_request.uid, t_request.`name`, t_request.quality, t_request.price, t_request.launched, t_request.time, t_request.view_count, t_request.cover, t_request.completed, COUNT(t_commodity.cid) cid_count, t_commodity_type.type_name, t_commodity_type.tid `type_id`, t_user.uid uid2, t_user.nickname, t_user.username, t_user.avatar FROM db_happy_trade.t_request LEFT JOIN db_happy_trade.t_commodity ON t_commodity.request_id = t_request.rid LEFT JOIN db_happy_trade.t_user ON t_commodity.uid = t_user.uid, db_happy_trade.t_commodity_type WHERE t_request.type_id = t_commodity_type.tid AND t_request.uid = #{uid} GROUP BY t_request.rid

SELECT t_request.rid, t_request.uid, t_request.`name`, t_request.quality, t_request.price, t_request.completed, t_request.launched, t_request.time, t_request.view_count, t_request.cover, t_request.completed, t_commodity_type.type_name, t_commodity_type.tid `type_id`, t_user.uid uid2, t_user.nickname, t_user.username, t_user.avatar FROM db_happy_trade.t_request, db_happy_trade.t_commodity_type, db_happy_trade.t_user WHERE
t_request.name like CONCAT('%',#{word},'%')
AND t_request.type_id = t_commodity_type.tid AND t_user.uid=t_request.uid AND t_request.completed=0

(select t_request.rid, t_request.uid, t_request.`name`, t_request.quality, t_request.price, t_request.completed, t_request.launched, t_request.time, t_request.view_count, t_request.cover, C.type_name, C.tid `type_id`, t_user.uid uid2, t_user.nickname, t_user.username, t_user.avatar from db_happy_trade.t_request, db_happy_trade.t_user, db_happy_trade.t_commodity_type A left join db_happy_trade.t_commodity_type B on A.tid = B.p_tid left join db_happy_trade.t_commodity_type C on B.tid = C.p_tid where A.tid = #{typeId} and t_user.uid = t_request.uid and t_request.type_id = C.tid) union all (select t_request.rid, t_request.uid, t_request.`name`, t_request.quality, t_request.price, t_request.completed, t_request.launched, t_request.time, t_request.view_count, t_request.cover, B.type_name, B.tid `type_id`, t_user.uid uid2, t_user.nickname, t_user.username, t_user.avatar from db_happy_trade.t_request, db_happy_trade.t_user, db_happy_trade.t_commodity_type A left join db_happy_trade.t_commodity_type B on A.tid = B.p_tid left join db_happy_trade.t_commodity_type C on B.tid = C.p_tid where A.tid = #{typeId} and t_user.uid = t_request.uid and t_request.type_id = B.tid) union all select t_request.rid, t_request.uid, t_request.`name`, t_request.quality, t_request.price, t_request.completed, t_request.launched, t_request.time, t_request.view_count, t_request.cover, B.type_name, B.tid `type_id`, t_user.uid uid2, t_user.nickname, t_user.username, t_user.avatar from db_happy_trade.t_request, db_happy_trade.t_user, db_happy_trade.t_commodity_type A left join db_happy_trade.t_commodity_type B on A.tid = B.p_tid left join db_happy_trade.t_commodity_type C on B.tid = C.p_tid where A.tid = #{typeId} and t_user.uid = t_request.uid and t_request.type_id = A.tid

SELECT t_request.rid, t_request.uid, t_request.`name`, t_request.quality, t_request.price, t_request.completed, t_request.launched, t_request.time, t_request.view_count, t_request.cover, t_commodity_type.type_name, t_commodity_type.tid `type_id`, t_user.uid uid2, t_user.nickname, t_user.username, t_user.avatar FROM db_happy_trade.t_request, db_happy_trade.t_commodity_type, db_happy_trade.t_user, (SELECT count(b.tid) `count`, C.tid `tid` FROM db_happy_trade.t_user_view_history, db_happy_trade.t_request, db_happy_trade.t_commodity_type A LEFT JOIN db_happy_trade.t_commodity_type B ON A.p_tid = B.tid LEFT JOIN db_happy_trade.t_commodity_type C ON B.tid = C.p_tid WHERE t_user_view_history.uid = #{uid} AND t_user_view_history.cid = t_request.rid AND t_request.type_id = A.tid GROUP BY C.tid LIMIT 1000) as temp WHERE (temp.tid = t_request.type_id or rand() < 0.0005) AND t_request.type_id = t_commodity_type.tid AND t_user.uid = t_request.uid AND t_request.completed = 0 ORDER BY - LOG(1.0 - RAND()) / temp.count

SELECT t_request.rid, t_request.uid, t_request.`name`, t_request.quality, t_request.price, t_request.completed, t_request.launched, t_request.time, t_request.view_count, t_request.cover, t_commodity_type.type_name, t_commodity_type.tid `type_id`, t_user.uid uid2, t_user.nickname, t_user.username, t_user.avatar FROM db_happy_trade.t_request, db_happy_trade.t_commodity_type, db_happy_trade.t_user WHERE t_request.type_id = t_commodity_type.tid AND t_user.uid = t_request.uid AND t_request.completed = 0 order by uid desc
